import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={val:[]};export const counterSlice=createSlice({name:'counter',initialState,reducers:{list:(state,action)=>{state.val.push(action.payload);},deleteItem:(state,action)=>{state.val=state.val.filter((_,i)=>i!==action.payload);}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
export const{list,deleteItem}=counterSlice.actions;export default counterSlice.reducer;
